result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case Called: 11:16am. Clerk: Denise. INCLUDES 13CF474, 13TR4319, 13TR4320, 14CF62, 14CF64, 13TR4318.  State & Cty appears by ADA Sid Brubacher. Defendant appears by and with Atty Lou Ann Bohn. Interpreter, Teresa Berger sworn & interprets. *VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. Court questions counsel re: min and max of dl revoation & IID. Statements made. State moves to DRI ct 2 (OAR) 13CF474- crt grants. State moves to DI 13TR4319 & 13TR4320- crt grants. State moves to DRI 14CF62 & 14CF64- crt grants.  State moves to DI 13TR4318- crt grants. PLEA: NO CONTEST -  ct 1 (OWI-3rd w/passenger < 16 yr old) 13CF474. Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  Atty Bohn makes statement. COURT ORDERS: Impose & Stay 320 days jail; Defendant placed on Probation for 2 yrs. CONDITIONS: $2,452.00 inclusive cc; 90 days jail w/huber if eligible for jail criteria; Defendant to serve at the discretion of the agent; but must start w/in 45 days;  No objection to transfer probation or jail to Shawano Cty; any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 48 months, as is the defendant herself/himself; Crt orders 1/2 Price IID; 48 months dl revocation; AODA; Absolute Sobriety - Alcohol. Crt advises and Defendant signs Ineligible Voting Form. Parties to provide Court with any Stipulation on jail credit. Adjourned: 11:50am.
